phrases: Do you have someone special like that?
Uh, that is not what I mean.
Do you have someone like that?
I want to marry someone like one of the legendary heroes.
I want to meet him, too.
After you killed so many demi-humans in your underground chamber,
you think you can beg for your life?!
One of those villagers I kept enslaved underground?
The Rising of the Shield Hero
You lot would have died like dogs in the wild if I had not taken you in back then!
Do you really think I have forgotten the atrocities you committed?
Will killing him help you get closure?
It is not just with the sword, right?
Have not you grown stronger in other ways?
You are a terrible person who put so many demi-humans through hell, then killed them.
But if I kill you now,
I will not be any different from you.
So I will not take your life.
You will live and atone for the sins you have committed.
Demis do not deserve to live.
Let us take this chance to run.
Idol imprisoned his demi-human slaves underground,
Because I was one of them.
It is not too late to turn back, you know?
Always keep smiling and play nice with the villagers.
And smile even more in hard times.
You must smile and help everyone around you smile, too.
And we will keep on living!
As survivors, let us rebuild our village, so it is the way it used to be!
I am sure that is what everyone who died would want!
But I do not want to cry.
Dad said I should keep smiling in hard times.
If you are trying so hard with a smile on your face,
I should do my best, too.
Raphtalia was trapped in a place like this?
It is easy to see what was happening here.
Just thinking about it makes me sick!
I am sure the Shield Hero will save us.
Hey, do you remember that flag?
It was a symbol of how we demi-humans were allowed to build a village for ourselves.
I want to see it again.
I want to go back to the village.
Let us go home to our village together.
I am sorry I could not make it any better.
You are being sold off to a slave merchant.
She is the only one being sold.
You will be all right now.
There is someone over here, too!
I am so glad you are alive!
That one time, you went diving and nearly drowned,
and Sadeena-oneechan had to save you.
You ate a poisonous mushroom and ended up with an upset stomach another time.
You were in pain and begged me not to tell anyone.
And when I said we should rebuild the village after the Wave,
you were the first one to agree.
I am so grateful that you are still alive.
I am with the Shield Hero right now.
The Shield Hero is here to save you.
Rifana-chan would have been so happy to see him.
Do you think the Shield Hero will come to save us?
I want to see him soon.
Have him make me his wife.
I cannot believe such monstrous deeds were being done in Melromarc.
As much as I hate to say it, similar things happen all across this country.
That is why we needed Seyaette.
Melty, I need you to do something for me.
and admonish the king for his unjust treatment.
Ordinarily, I would go myself, but...
I am sorry I took so long.
She was gentler and more graceful than me,
and she would always say she wanted to meet you... meet the Shield Hero.
Let us give her and the others a proper send-off.
They cannot rest in peace in a place like this.
Before meeting you, I was powerless.
If only I was stronger, I could have kept everyone safe!
If you had not come to help,
I probably would have died here.
And the only reason everyone hung in there without losing hope was your smile!
We decided to keep smiling, no matter how bad things got!
I cannot smile like I used to.
Everything I have done so far...
I do not have the right to walk beside you!
If I had not met you,
I would have run from this world without ever trusting anyone.
It is because you believed in me back then that I am here right now,
that I got to meet Filo and Melty.
It cannot have been a mistake.
I mean, you were so tiny, and now you have met the Shield Hero,
become such a cool lady, and come back to save us!
You were the one who kept those kids alive.
I am sure Rifana-chan's happy she got to meet the Shield Hero, too.
From now on, we have to protect them.
Make sure nobody goes through what you and she did.
Is not that why you fought with me for all this time?
Together with me, the Shield Hero?
You are in the Shield Hero's party.
And one day, let us go back to a village with that flag.
I promise I will bring back the flag from those days...
In order to take you back,
demi-humans from your domain are rioting here.
Go let them know you are all right.
grant me the power to rend the Devil asunder!
The heroes of the past built that stone monument to seal a monster away.
Is he trying to release that seal?!
You are free from your confines now, beast!
Bring divine judgment down upon the Devil of the Shield!
If I can kill the Devil of the Shield,
I will be eternally blessed by God!
